name: TearItUp
description:
A physics based monster truck drag racing game! Race and smash up cars in 9 customisable monster trucks! 17 levels with 2 bosses spread throughout the city. Make sure to keep your truck balanced in order to get the perfect race.

Controls:
W - Accelerate

S - Brake/Reverse

A and D - Left and Right tilt

Space - Start Race

Esc - Pause
